Architecture Blueprints

Architecture Blueprints

Explore our gallery of deployment patterns, infrastructure stacks, and application architectures.

AI RAG Application (LangChain/Vector DB)

v1

A reference architecture for a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) application using LLMs, a vector database for embedding storage, and an orchestration framework.

Stack

  • Llm: openai-gpt4
  • Orchestrator: langchain
  • Vector db: pinecone
  • App: python-fastapi
  • Data: unstructured-docs

Key Components

User Query RAG API Service Ingestion Worker Document Sources +2 more
ai llm rag python langchain
View Diagram

Modern Data Stack (ELT)

v1

A modern, scalable data pipeline focusing on the ELT (Extract, Load, Transform) pattern using industry standard tools for warehousing and transformation.

Stack

  • Ingestion: airbyte
  • Warehouse: snowflake
  • Transform: dbt
  • Orchestration: airflow
  • Bi: superset

Key Components

Data Sources Airbyte / Fivetran Data Warehouse (Snowflake) Transformation (dbt) +2 more
data analytics snowflake dbt airflow
View Diagram

Event-Driven Microservices (Kafka)

v1

A decoupled microservices architecture utilizing Apache Kafka for asynchronous communication and event streaming between domains.

Stack

  • Broker: kafka
  • Services: go-java-node
  • Registry: schema-registry
  • Coordination: zookeeper-kraft

Key Components

Order Service Kafka Cluster Schema Registry Inventory Service +2 more
kafka microservices event-driven distributed-systems
View Diagram

Enterprise Jamstack (Next.js + Vercel)

v1

High-performance frontend architecture utilizing Edge rendering, headless CMS, and serverless functions.

Stack

  • Framework: nextjs
  • Platform: vercel
  • Cms: sanity
  • Auth: clerk
  • Db: neon

Key Components

Edge Network (CDN) Next.js Application Headless CMS (Sanity) Auth Provider (Clerk) +3 more

Go microservices behind API Gateway

v1

Blueprint for a set of Go microservices exposed via an API gateway, backed by Postgres and Redis, running on Kubernetes with an ingress controller and GitOps-driven deployments.

Stack

  • Language: go
  • Framework: net-http-or-chi
  • Data store: postgres
  • Cache: redis
  • Deploy target: kubernetes
  • Gateway: api-gateway-or-ingress

Key Components

API gateway / ingress controller Public HTTP API service Admin / internal service Postgres database +2 more
go microservices kubernetes api-gateway postgres redis
View Diagram

Kubernetes GitOps Platform (ArgoCD)

v1

A robust platform engineering stack for Kubernetes, utilizing GitOps principles with ArgoCD, Service Mesh (Istio), and comprehensive observability.

Stack

  • Orchestration: kubernetes
  • Gitops: argocd
  • Network: istio
  • Observability: prometheus-grafana
  • Cloud: cloud-agnostic

Key Components

Git Repo (Config) ArgoCD Controller Istio Service Mesh Prometheus +3 more
kubernetes gitops argocd istio prometheus
View Diagram

Enterprise Java (Spring Boot on K8s)

v1

A standard enterprise-grade stack for Java applications using Spring Boot, deployed on Kubernetes with centralized configuration and discovery.

Stack

  • Language: java
  • Framework: spring-boot
  • Runtime: jvm
  • Data: postgres
  • Messaging: activemq

Key Components

Ingress Controller Spring Boot API Spring Cloud Config / K8s ConfigMap PostgreSQL +2 more

Containerized LAMP (Docker Compose)

v1

Modernized LAMP stack running as containerized services orchestrated by Docker Compose. Portable across any cloud that supports Docker.

Stack

  • Kind: lamp
  • Language: php
  • Container: docker
  • Orchestrator: docker-compose
  • Data store: mysql

Key Components

Reverse Proxy (Traefik/Nginx) PHP-FPM Container MySQL Container Docker Compose
lamp docker container php mysql

LAMP on AWS ECS (Fargate)

v1

LAMP stack packaged into containers and run on AWS ECS (Fargate), fronted by an Application Load Balancer with RDS MySQL.

Stack

  • Kind: lamp
  • Language: php
  • Web server: apache
  • Data store: mysql
  • Deploy target: ecs
  • Clouds: aws

Key Components

Application Load Balancer ECS service (Fargate) LAMP task (Apache + PHP) RDS MySQL/MariaDB +1 more
lamp php mysql aws ecs

v1

  • Language: php
  • Web server: nginx

  • Deploy target: vm
  • Clouds: awsdigitalocean

  • Auth: supabase-auth
